title: Forgive us, Lord! to thee we cry

verses.text: Forgive us, Lord! to thee we cry; Forgive us thy matchless grace; On thee alone our souls rely: Be thou our strength and righteousness.
Forgive thou us, as we forgive; The ills we suffer from our foes; Restore us, Lord! and bid us live; O! let us not in arms repose.
Forgive us, for our guilt is great! Our wretched souls in merit boast; For foreign mercy still we wait, And ask but in the Saviour's name.
